title: Does avicus use vps for the minigame worlds ?

replies.body:
I think Ivy uses lilypad because he likes their community better :P
Heres a topic he made there: http://www.lilypadmc.org/threads/lilypad.558/

replies.body:
That is not me, someone created an account with my old username and decided to impersonate me. Refer to http://www.lilypadmc.org/threads/avicus.556/#post-5287. But I've been trying to get the user removed from the site.

On topic: We use multiple dedicated servers, not VPS', and yes, BungeeCord.
